subject: Use of Automatic Traffic Counter and Classifiers (ATCC) for NHAI Roads.
text: #Trdfu <cfly TTTHT grfadro TH /Phone: 91-11-25074100/25074200 4 /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 (eo 4ar &r rorrrif FATTT4) QH. /Extn;= 2223 2318 2468 2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 8f-5 Wa 6, #qer-10, ERrATT, 7$ faorii 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No:: 11041/218/2007-Admn: 22.10.2009 POLICY MATTERS TECHNICAL (36/2009) (Decision taken on TIC Division File No: NHAI/Tech/TIC/genl/2009) Sub: Use of Automatic Traffic Counter and Classifiers (ATCC) for NHAI Roads. It has been observed that the traffic census on the projects  being developed by NHAI is carried out manually by the DPR/Supervision Consultants. 2. IRC SP 84 _ 2009 Manual of Standards and Specifications for Four Laning of Highways on PPP mode provides for Automatic Traffic Counter cum Classifiers (ATCC) for collecting traffic data. 3 Automatic Traffic Counter cum Classifiers (ATCC) using Infrared Technology are already installed by various concessionaires. 4_ It has been decided to collect traffic data by Using Automatic Traffic Counter cum Classifiers (ATCC) on all NHAI projects. Accordingly, provisions for the same may be made in the RFP for appointment of Consultant should be made; 5_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. V_ (K Venkata Ramana) General Manager (Coord:) To: 1 PS to Chairman 2. PS to All Members 3. PS to All CGMs/CVO 4. AII GMs/DGMs/Managers 5. All PIUs/CMUs/SPVs 6. Librarian/Hindi Officer T 71 NHAL Q
